doc:
Jean-Paul Moulinot https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean-Paul_Moulinot 0 Jean-Paul Moulinot (30 June 1912 – 3 December 1989) was a French actor, sociétaire of the Comédie-Française. Elisabeth (Yvette) Hardy (1917-2000), a comedian at the TNP, was his wife. Close to Jean Vilar, he took part to the first Festival d'Avignon in 1947 and from 1951, the year the TNP reopened, he belonged to the troupe where he remained during all the years Jean Vilar was the director, then joined the Comédie-Française until his death. Jean-Paul_Moulinot ( 30_June_1912 – 3_December_1989 ) was a_French_actor , sociétaire of the_Comédie-Française . Elisabeth_(_Yvette_)_Hardy_(_1917-2000_) , a_comedian at the_TNP , was his_wife . Close to Jean_Vilar , he took part to the_first_Festival_d'Avignon in 1947 and from 1951 , the_year the_TNP reopened , he belonged to the_troupe where he remained during all_the_years_Jean_Vilar was the_director , then joined the_Comédie-Française until his_death .
